1381366.effect: The last Remnant of men rejoice as she appears from the shadows, a relic of the past, the legendary hero that drove the Insects into a deep slumber. Maybe with her guidance the galaxy may yet be saved once again as she chooses another Remnant of man to lead the fight against the Insects.
1381366.name: Legendary Remnant of the Past

1383142.effect: 1 "Remnant" monster + 1 Psychic Normal MonsterThe activation and effects of "Remnant" Trap cards activated on your field cannot be negated. Once per turn: You can target 2 banished "Remnant" cards and 1 card on the field; return the first 2 targets to the GY, and if you do, shuffle the second target into the Deck. If this card you control is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 Psychic Normal Monster from your hand, and if you do, it gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Mecha MK-3" once per turn.
1383142.name: Remnant Mecha MK-3

1383588.effect: 1 "Remnant" monster + 1 WATER Normal MonsterOnce per turn, during your End Phase, shuffle 2 "Remnant" cards from your Graveyard into the Deck or destroy this card. Negate the effects of face-up monsters while your opponent controls them. Each turn, the first time this card would be destroyed by battle, it is not destroyed. If this card you control is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 Psychic Normal Monster from your GY, and if you do, it gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use this effect of "Remnant Mecha Dreadnought" once per turn.
1383588.name: Remnant Mecha Dreadnought

1383523.effect: 1 "Remnant" monster + 1 WATER Fusion MonsterThis card can attack all monsters your opponent controls during each Battle Phase once each. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Remnant" card you control; destroy that card, also, switch all monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position and all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 1000 ATK/DEF. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished Psychic monsters, and if you do, it gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Vessel USCSS Voyager" once per turn.
1383523.name: Remnant Vessel USCSS Voyager

9514.effect: 2 Thunder monstersOnce per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Thunder monster in your GY, except a Link Monster; Special Summon it to your zone this card points to.

8687.effect: Target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.

159879.effect:

2 Spellcaster monsters with different names

You can only use each effect of "Interesting Elixstar" once per turn.

2+ Level 4 Spellcaster Monsters with different names, including an "Elixstar" monster
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 3 or lower Spellcaster Xyz Monster you control as material (Transfer its materials to this card.) (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 banished "Potion" Spell; apply its effect, and if you do, shuffle it into the deck. When your opponent Special Summons a monster from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Winged-Beast/DARK/Level 9/ATK 2700/DEF 2500) and it gains the following effect. (This is NOT treated as a Trap.) You can only use this effect of "Rider of Dragonsbane" once per turn.● At the Start of the Damage Step, if your opponent controls a monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can destroy 1 card you control, then destroy all Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls. [NoC]
1391129.name: Rider of Dragonsbane

1387076.effect: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 0 ATK; change the ATK of all Link Monsters your opponent controls to 0, also negate their effects. If a Link Monster is Link Summoned to your opponent's field, while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 Link Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, and if you do, it cannot be use as Link Material. You can only use 1 "Root Ransom Virus" eftect per turn, and only once that turn.
1387076.name: Root Ransom Virus

1307959.effect: Banish 2 cards from your GY, face-down. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card's activation, add both cards to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Sealed Tomb" per turn. [NoC]
1307959.name: Sealed Tomb

1409704.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell Card: Pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, banish it. During the end of this Phase, if this card in the GY was activated this turn (and was not negated): Banish this card, and if you do, add the Spell banished by this card's effect to your opponent's hand. You can only activate 1 "Take Flight, Mekavians!" per turn.
1409704.name: Take Flight, Mekavians!

1311654.effect: If a WATER monster(s) you control is destroyed: Fusion Summon 1 WATER Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using WATER monsters from your hand or Deck as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Torrential Fusion" per turn.
1311654.name: Torrential Fusion

1391289.effect: When a monster is Special Summoned, the opponent of the player who controls that monster can inflict 500 damage to their opponent. If you take damage by the effect of "Torrential Strife", place 1 Strife Counter on this card. If this card is sent to the GY with 16 or more Strife Counters, you win the Duel. You cannot activate this card or resolve this effect if you have gained 200 or more LP during this Duel. You can only control 1 "Torrential Strife". [NoC]
1391289.name: Torrential Strife

1230490.effect:
Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) with the following effects. (This card is also still a Trap.)
● This card can attack directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. (Quick Effect): You can Set this card in its Spell & Trap Zone.
1230490.name: Tsukumogami Living Gate

1307940.effect: During the End Phase of the turn this card was activated, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards your opponent added from their Deck to their hand this turn. You can only activate 1 "Unsealed Chaos" per turn.
1307940.name: Unsealed Chaos

1307938.effect: During your opponent's turn: Draw until you have 3 cards in your hand, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, your opponent takes no damage. At the end of the next Main Phase 1, send your entire hand to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Unsealed Riches" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters while this card is in the GY.
1307938.name: Unsealed Riches

1391114.effect: When this card is activated: You can target 1 Trap in your GY; add it to your hand. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect: You can Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 10/ATK 2800/DEF 2800) and it gains the following effect. (This is NOT treated as a Trap.) You can only use this effect of "Wielder of the Divine Lances" once per turn.● Once per chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect while you control a face-up Trap (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Trap you control or from your hand to the GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. [NoC]
1391114.name: Wielder of the Divine Lances

1450950.effect: When your opponent Special Summons a monster: Check all monsters in your opponents GY, and if there are no monsters in your opponents GY with the summoned monsters Type and Attribute, shuffle that monster into the Deck.
1450950.name: You Are Not the Father!

1450929.effect: When your opponent Special Summons a monster: Check all monsters in your opponents GY, and if there is at least 1 monster in your opponents GY that shares the summoned monsters Type and Attribute, your opponent cannot Special Summon monsters with that Type and Attribute while they control the summoned monster, also monsters with that Type and Attribute cannot attack for the rest of this turn.
1450929.name: You Are the Father!

1048356.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned while you have more cards in your Deck than your opponent does: Send up to 5 cards from the top of your Deck to the GY, up to the difference. Once per turn: You can gain 100 LP for each card in the GYs. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
1048356.name: Anne, Lightsworn Incensor

1409976.effect: Cannot attack the turn it is Normal Summoned. If a monster you control is banished by your own activated effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "D.D.D. - Different Dimension Destroyer" once per turn. This card cannot declare an attack unless you banish 1 monster from your hand, field, or GY.
1409976.name: D.D.D. - Different Dimension Destroyer

1376578.effect: If you do not control a face-up Field Spell (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; activate 1 "Future Visions" directly from your Deck, then send 1 "Fortune Lady" monster you control to the GY. This card's ATK/DEF become its Level x400. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Increase this card's Level by 1 (max. 12).
1376578.name: Fortune Lady Paradox

1351151.effect: If you control a "Hieratic" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Hieratic" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Tutan" once per turn.
1351151.name: Hieratic Dragon of Tutan

1200960.effect: You can send 1 "Naturia" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Naturia Bee" once per turn. If a "Naturia" card(s) would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 EARTH monster from your GY, instead.
1200960.name: Naturia Bee

1200941.effect: Once per turn: You can place 1 Venom Counter on 1 monster your opponent controls. You can remove all Venom Counters from the field; add 1 "Venom" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Venom Viper" once per turn.
1200941.name: Venom Viper

1164160.effect: If a FIRE monster(s) is Summoned: You can Special Summon this card from your hand to another Main Monster Zone in the same column as that monster(s). If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all cards in this card's column. If this card is sent to the GY by a monster effect: You can Special Summon it, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Wild Mark" once per turn.
1164160.name: Wild Mark

1560079.effect: Born in the slums of Draconia's capital, this brave soul joined the army from a tender age. His fiery determination in battle earned him a respectable position in the army and a strong friendship with then-crown prince Jono. Despite his fierce loyalty to his country and its people, he grows concerned about his friend's changing demeanor upon assuming the throne...
1560079.name: Katsu, Underdog of Draconia
1560079.pendulum_effect: During your Draw Phase, when you draw a Normal Monster(s) while you have 4 or less cards in your hand: You can reveal it; draw 1 more card.

1417888.effect: Target 1 face-up "Crystron" card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Crystron Luster" once per turn. If a "Crystron" card(s) would be destroyed by battle or by card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
1417888.name: Crystron Luster

1245901.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 face-up "Dinomist" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can return this card and 1 other card you control to the hand; Special Summon 1 "Dinomist" monster from your hand or GY. You can only activate 1 "Dinomist Cooldown" per turn.
1245901.name: Dinomist Cooldown

1526820.effect: All "True Draco" and "True King" monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF. The first time each Tribute Summoned "True Draco" or "True King" monster would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn: You can send 1 other card from your hand or field to the GY, and if you do, add 1 "True Draco" or "True King" card from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Wyrm monsters.
1526820.name: Dragonic Ascension

879333.effect: "Iron Chain" monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF for each card in your opponent's GY. While you control an "Iron Chain" monster, if your opponent activates the effect of a card in their GY, or an effect that would move a card in the GY to a different place, inflict 300 damage to them. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can target 1 monster in either GY; shuffle it into the Deck.
879333.name: Forge of Iron Chains

1235714.effect: When this card is activated: You can banish up to 3 "Spellbook" cards with different names from your hand or Deck. If the activation of a "Spellbook" Spell/Trap Card is negated: You can target 1 of your "Spellbook" Spells/Traps with a different name that is banished or in the GY; add it your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your GY, and if you do, double its ATK and DEF. You can only activate 1 "Spellbook of Destiny" per turn.
1235714.name: Spellbook of Destiny

1413723.effect: Target 1 "The Phantom Knights" monster that is banished or in your GY; Special Summon it, but shuffle it into the Deck when it leaves the field. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY and target 3 "Phantom Knights" cards that are banished, except "The Phantom Knights of Shadow's Return"; shuffle them into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "The Phantom Knights of Shadow's Return" once per turn.
1413723.name: The Phantom Knights of Shadow's Return
1413723.treated_as: The Phantom Knights of Shadow's Return

1407677.effect: Equip only to a "Vampire" monster. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. Once per turn, at the start of the Battle Phase: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls; negate the effects of that card until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY; gain 500 Life Points for each "Vampire" monster you control.
1407677.name: Vampire Greatblade

1219996.effect: If you would discard a Spell to activate a "Witchcrafter" monster effect, you can send 1 Spell from your Deck to the GY instead. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you use this effect, except "Witchcrafter" monsters. During your Main Phase or your opponent's End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can discard 1 card, and if you do, add 1 "Witchcrafter" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use 1 "Witchcrafter House effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1219996.name: Witchcrafter House

166706.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Aqua/WATER/Level 2/ATK 1200/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, this card is unaffected by monster effects. If you control a Level 2 WATER Aqua monster, you can activate this card the turn it was Set. Once per Chain, when a Trap Card is activated while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Aqua/WATER/Level 2/ATK 1200/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, this card is unaffected by monster effects, also banish it when it leaves the field.
166706.name: Paleozoic Trilobite

1318580.effect: 1 "Lyrilusc" monster + 1 Winged Beast monsterMust first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by returning the above cards you control to the hand (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). You can only Special Summon "Lyrilusc - Stellar Bunting" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 2 "Lyrilusc" monsters from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Lyrilusc - Stellar Bunting" once per turn.
1318580.name: Lyrilusc - Stellar Bunting

1345939.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Thunder monster. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. A monster equipped with this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase, also it gains 500 ATK. If this card is sent to the GY or banished: You can equip it to 1 Thunder monster you control. You can only use this effect of "Titan Strike Blade" once per turn.
1345939.name: Titan Strike Blade

1450148.effect:
1 "Oxygeddon" + 2 "Hydrogeddon"
Must first be Fusion Summoned. If you control "Hydrogeddon", you can treat it as 2 "Hydrogeddon" for the Fusion Summon of this card. If your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, return it the the hand. If this card is sent to the GY by your opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Water Dragon" or "Water Dragon Cluster" from your hand or Deck, ignoring it's summoning conditions. You can only use each effect of "Water Dragon Tsunami" once per turn.
1450148.name: Water Dragon Tsunami

1319245.effect: 2 Level 4 monstersIf the only monsters this card has as material are FIRE and/or WATER monsters: You can detach 1 material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects;● Send 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE or WATER monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.● Discard 1 card, then place 1 of your Spells/Traps that is banished or in the GY on the top or bottom of your Deck.You can only use this effect of "Lavalval Shadow" once per turn.
1319245.name: Lavalval Shadow

1169430.effect:
2+ "Altergeist" monster
Gains ATK equal to half of the original ATK of each "Altergeist" monster it points to. Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated in the GY (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "Altergeist" monster that this card points to, and if you do, negate that card or effect. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Personal Spoofing" from the GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Altergeist Melarona" once per turn.
1169430.name: Altergeist Melarona

1117429.effect: 2 Insect monstersWhile this card points to an Insect Synchro Monster, it cannot be destroyed by battle. You can target 1 Insect Tuner and up to 2 non-Tuner Insect monsters in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then Special Summon 1 "Battlewasp" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck whose Level is equal to the total Levels of the shuffled monsters, but it cannot attack this turn. You can only use this effect of "Battlewasp - Akiza the Berserker" once per turn.
1117429.name: Battlewasp - Akiza the Berserker

1264735.effect:
2 Dinosaur monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Lost World" from your Deck to your hand. You can discard 1 card and target 1 Dinosaur monster this card points to; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Carnage Carnivore" once per turn.
1264735.name: Carnage Carnivore

1242013.effect: 2 WIND monsters, including a "Gusto" monsterOther "Gusto" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can target 2 "Gusto" monsters in your GY; Special Summon them in face-down Defense Position, then send 1 WIND monster from your hand or field to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Gusto Parrot" once per turn.
1242013.name: Gusto Parrot
